text.autoconfig.armorchroma.title: Armor Chroma Config
text.autoconfig.armorchroma.option.rende: Display empty armor icons when your armor is less than 20
text.autoconfig.armorchroma.option.compr: Compress the bar into different colored borders when your armor exceeds 20
text.autoconfig.armorchroma.option.useTe: Use a texture for partial icons
When enabled, allows changing the partial icon masks
When disabled, allows partial icons to have non-vanilla shapes
